title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 90 - Public And Free Association Libraries
content:

Notes

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 207-208, 215, 253-268, 271-273, 273-a, 279, 282, 283, 284, 285; L. 1978, ch. 787; L. 1993, ch. 260, §§ 1, 3; L. 2006, ch. 53, § 1; L. 2007, ch. 53, § 1, ch. 57, part
B
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
